name: Aviva (2020)
description: \n                    \"Aviva\" is a uniquely sexy dancing in the streets, sheets and bars impressionistic take on a movie romance, set in a New York world of gender-fluid and frequently fully unclothed bodies.  Director Boaz Yakin 's (\"Fresh,\" \"Remember the Titans,\" \"A Price Above Rubies\") dreamy film, with choreography from former member of Israeli dance company Batsheva Dance Company and co-star Bobbi Jene Smith, tells a story that is timeless, universal and yet up-to-the-moment. \n
